about_the_game:
Tarot spirit card set includes the following digital content :

  • The World spirit card: Master of the world. Destroy any evil who dares lay hands on you.

  • The Star spirit card: Let The Star guide you the way. A beacon of hope that will destroy evil in your path.

  • The Moon spirit card: Fear the sword of the moon. Mysterious guardian of the night.

  • The Sun spirit card: The Sun shines bright. Radiating joy and happiness that burn away the gloom.

  • The Wheel of Fortune spirit card: Fortune favors the bold. Protect and heal you from the unfortunate.
